# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a burner inserter at position(x=39.5, y=-79.5)
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a burner inserter at position(x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Stone furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)
- Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5)
- Pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5)
- Electricity group (position x=114.5, y=-28.666666666666668)

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5)
- Transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
- Make sure to provide fuel to burner entities before using them.
### Errors when using entities without ingredients
- Make sure to provide ingredients to entities before using them.
### Errors when using steam engine without connection
- Make sure to connect the steam engine to a power network before using it.
### Errors when using electricity group without plugging into electric network
- Make sure to plug the electricity group into an electric network before using it.
### Errors when using pipe group without fluid
- Make sure to provide fluid to pipe groups before using them.
### Errors when using belt group without items
- Make sure to provide items to belt groups before using them.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined or invoked.
No important variables have been assigned.
